entry.title: 3M 17304C - Command Cord Bundlers, 17304C, 2 Per Pack 17304C 7100130342
entry.summary:
Vendor: 3M
Type:
Price: 4.00

[shortdesc]

Command Cord Bundlers, 17304C, 2 per pack

  • No more dangerous, tangled cords behind your computers, appliances and entertainment centres! Command™ Cord Bundlers are perfect for work and home offices, as well as entertainment areas, where they keep cords organized and safely out of the way
  • Command™ Cord Bundlers stick to many surfaces, including paint, wood, tile and more
  • They also come off leaving no holes, marks, sticky residue or stains - and if you need to re-organize your cords, it's as easy as applying a Command® Refill Strip, so you can use them again and again!
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand 3M
    Origin Country China

    Product Information

  • Damage-free hanging
  • Weight capacity: 2 lbs (0.9 kg)
  • Size: Medium
  • Colour: White
  • Package contains 2 Command™ Cord Bundlers, 3 Command® Refill Strips
  • Holds strongly and removes cleanly
  • Easy to apply and remove
  • Works on a variety of surfaces
  • Blends in seamlessly with décor

Command Spring Clip, 17005-HWEF

  • Keep your dish towels, rubber gloves, recipe cards, and more handy but hidden with Command™ Spring Clips
  • Easy to mount under the sink or inside cabinets, keeping things right where you need them
  • Forget about nails, screws and tacks, Command™ Spring Clips are fast and easy to hang! Using the revolutionary Command™ Adhesive, Command™ Spring Clips hold strongly on a variety of surfaces, including paint, wood, tile and more
  • Command™ Spring Clips remove cleanly - no holes, marks, sticky residue or stains
  • Reusing the clip is easy: simply apply a new Command® Refill Strip, and use it again and again
  • Contains 1 hook, 2 strips.
    • [/shortdesc]

  • Spring makes it convenient to grab items when you need it.
